descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone im skull19972 

Description : this mod makes a hybrid race it have a completly new transformation to the hybrid race and it is very powerful a race with vampires blood and werewolf blood a race more powerful than both

The hybriid!!!!!!

to take it you must have the vampire lord abilities in you powers list + the beast form abilities 
you can find a spell book in dawnguard  castle 
see pic and when you open the book the abilities will be add with both werewolf and vampire perk

Enjoy!!!!
it was skull19972 and this is my mod
author: skull19972
